column5: for all you guys that leave your boat in the water for lengthy period of time, what is your ritual?  boat cover, trip motor, motor cover, 2 tie downs, etc, etc?

I leave my boat in a lift sling from ice out to ice in.  I only cover in the winter months.  I do have a metal roof that is shared with boats on either side so I do not worry too much about rain.  I do cover my seats every night though just to keep bugs and bird doo doo off.
2 ties to the dock and no cover. Had a cover the first year and every time I came up it had blown off and water had gotten in anyway. No problems with theft either in 6 years.
Custom canvas mooring cover.  Wash bird stains off cover in fall  Wash growth stains off hull in fall
